item.description:
NAME = joni Spicer
EMAIL = glenechoblvd@yahoo.com
COMMENT = Ladies you are welcome to come to my house at Superbowl gametime Sunday for a loud, fun , snackin good time. Bring a friend and a fingerfood or cocktail of your choice. I got the soft drinks. You can wear a helmet if you like but please no cleats. LOL
My address is 125 Glen Echo Bl. Stoughton, about a mile or 3 traffic lites from Target off 139. I don't know much about the game, except for "tight ends and wide receivers" Hope to see you 6pm Sunday.
Warmly, Joni


This invitation is posted by CSSOB on behalf of member Lady Joni. Please contact Lady Joni for further information.

group.name: The Original Steppers of Boston Inc. 2006

item.name: Ladies invited to Superbowl event by Lady Joni
